title: Process a Standard Sale
description: A store associate needs to process a standard cash purchase for a customer at the Point of Sale (POS) system.

tasks.description: Scan the items the customer is purchasing.
tasks.expected_outcome: All items are correctly scanned and appear in the transaction list with the correct price.

tasks.description: Take cash payment from the customer and enter the amount into the POS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system calculates the correct change due to the customer.

tasks.description: Complete the transaction, open the cash drawer, and provide the customer with their change and receipt.
tasks.expected_outcome: The transaction is finalized, and the receipt is printed successfully.
